mediaCoverage.title: MSME Bharat Summit 2025
mediaCoverage.content:
**Our Founder & CEO** Priyanka Mishra visited the summit and connected with other startup founders.

 She explored the MSME canvas in the country in this one-day power-packed event bringing together thousand+ MSME stakeholders under one roof! From policy makers to founders, consultants to innovators...,

**Key highlights**:[ About the event](https://msmesampark.com/msme-bharat-summit-2025-new-delhi/)

mediaCoverage.title: FRANCHISE INDIA 2025
mediaCoverage.content:
This event at YASHOBHOOMI, India International Convention and Expo Centre, Delhi saw many Edtech and Tech startups showcasing their growth potential

[Find out more about the event here](https://www.franchiseindia.com/expo/)

mediaCoverage.title: HINDI EXCELLENCE SUMMIT, DELHI
mediaCoverage.content:
This Prestigious event held at United Services Institution Auditorium, Rao Tularam Marg, New Delhi explored various key facets around AI for sustainable growth, Climate Action, Good Health & Well Being and Quality Education and Reach.

 **Key aspect** was that all these were discussed using only Hindi Language as the medium by various eminent personalities.

 **Ms. Priyanka Mishra** spoke in this event on the topic **नवोन्मेष के युग में सतत विकास**, which was about how Hindi is poised to play a bigger role now more than ever in the world of AI and new technologies.

[Full coverage available here](https://globalhindi.org/#)

mediaCoverage.title: हिंदी मेधा पुरस्कार २०२४
mediaCoverage.content:
On the auspicious occasion of **हिंदी दिवस २०२४** and in the loving memory of nationally acclaimed famous writer and journalist *Late Shri Naresh Misra*, we organized *हिंदी मेधा पुरस्कार* together with Nehru Gram Bharati University. 

 **Highlights** of the event: A Hindi Speech Competition was organized for the students of Prayagraj city in Uttar Pradesh, in the esteemed prescence of Member of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Council, *Shri Man Singh Yadav*, along with CRC Officer Mr. Shantanu Khare and Ms. Shivani Srivastava of the Nehru Gram Bharati University.

mediaCoverage.title: Hindi Diwas 2023 - Press Meet, Lucknow
mediaCoverage.content:
*Saraswati Hindi Jagat* on the occassion of **Hindi Diwas 2023** organized a press meet at the famous *Indian Coffee House, Hazratganj, Lucknow*.

- **Purpose of the meet** was to discuss on the importance of how Hindi can help to unlock a huge opportunity for Indian women and housewives.

[**Watch Video**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jenpbacVaQA)

mediaCoverage.title: Hindi Diwas 2022
mediaCoverage.content:
On the occasion of Hindi Diwas, Ms. Priyanka Mishra spoke about her growth journey as a Hindi Startup.

 She also spoke about how we can leverage the power of Hindi to connect all Indians and their families worldwide to Indian Culture, Ethos and Values

achievements.title: Certificate of Academic Achievement by our student
achievements.content:
**Awarded to our Class P5 Student for:**

- being **FIRST**
- in Hindi as a Mother Tongue Language in **Primary Five**.
